cont.entity_a: Incredible sound quality with a slightly warmer tone than SR80i's. Excellent sound clarity and accuracy. Sound quality is superb with a smooth, detailed sound. Clarity and extended frequency response are hard to beat.
cont.entity_b: Sound is amazing with great bass and treble balance. High sound quality with clear acoustics and deep bass.

cont.entity_a: Durability issues with the earpiece falling off the mounting stalk.
cont.entity_b: Durability issues with rubber pieces falling off easily. Durability issues with wires breaking and earphones becoming non-functional. Durability issues with wire splitting after extensive use. Durability issues with silicone ear pieces coming off.

cont.entity_a: Comfort issues for some users, especially those wearing glasses. Ear pads are not the most comfortable, causing discomfort after 30 minutes. Comfort is tolerable for up to 2 hours of non-stop listening. Bowl-shaped pads hurt ears after 30 minutes unless put on backwards.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable for long periods of use. Comfortable fit with super-soft gel tips. Comfortable and snug fit with adjustable ear pieces.

cont.entity_a: Distinct retro style. Semi-open design is not ideal for noisy environments.
Noise isolation is non-existent, making them unsuitable for noisy environments.
cont.entity_b: Good noise cancellation quality. Good sound but permits too much outside noise.

cont.entity_a: 1/4" plug requires an adapter for 1/8" connections. Not suitable for laptop or computer use without an adapter.
Best headphones for the price range, outperforming more expensive models.
cont.entity_b: High-quality sound and comfort for the price.

cont.entity_a: High-quality audio product, especially for rock or folk music. Good for mixing, mastering, and production of audio.
cont.entity_b: Music and games sound phenomenal. Great for running, as they don't fall out.

cont.entity_a: Not monitoring headphones due to slight bass bias.
cont.entity_b: Good customer service with unexpected product upgrades.
